{"id":786495405,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1661795062,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/786495405/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Increasing Decreasing String","memory":"43.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String sortString(String s) {\n        int cnt[]=new int[26];\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){\n            cnt[s.charAt(i)-'a']++;\n        }\n        StringBuilder sb=new StringBuilder();\n        while(true){\n            if(s.length()==sb.length())break;\n            for(int i=0;i<26;i++){\n                if(cnt[i]>0){\n                    sb.append((char)(i+'a'));\n                    cnt[i]--;\n                }\n            }\n            for(int i=25;i>=0;i--){\n                if(cnt[i]>0){\n                    sb.append((char)(i+'a'));\n                    cnt[i]--;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return sb.toString();\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"increasing-decreasing-string","has_notes":false}
